page.title: 20CARNIVALS/HOME LIFE
page.content: { { {RUYTON CARNIVAL (contd)} of the carnival. The draw is in the safe hands of Mr. R. Penton as is the erection of banners and bunting which is put up across the road through the village two weeks before the big event, getting everyone into the spirit of the occasion. {My House and Me - Rhys Williams} My house is a nice house with a good view of a hill. It is up a steep little lane. We have a big garden with a wood behind. It is quite a big house but it is called a cottage. I have a BMX bike for doing stunts. I am not very good yet but everything needs practise. When there is nothing else to do I play on the computer.
